meanings.definition: A type of shrub or small tree with silver-gray leaves and small, fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The elaeagnuses in the garden bloomed beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy walking past the elaeagnuses on my way to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The elaeagnuses whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden, with elaeagnuses of memories blooming in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The silver leaves of the elaeagnuses shimmered in the sunlight, casting a magical glow.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the elaeagnus plant, resembling an olive in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She picked the ripe elaeagnuses from the tree and placed them in a basket.
meanings.sent2: The elaeagnuses were used to make a delicious jam.
meanings.sent3: The elaeagnuses rolled playfully down the hill, like mischievous marbles.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like elaeagnuses, deep and rich in color.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the elaeagnuses filled the kitchen as she cooked.

meanings.definition: The act of planting or cultivating elaeagnus plants in a garden or landscape.
meanings.sent1: Gardening enthusiasts gathered to learn more about elaeagnuses cultivation.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated her weekends to elaeagnuses gardening in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: The elaeagnuses cultivation workshop was a blooming success.
meanings.sent4: His passion for elaeagnuses gardening knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The elaeagnuses cultivation brought new life to the once barren land.
